content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Ryanah. I am looking for a fair rental price that will allow me to maximize my gains. Could you please propose a rental price that you would be willing to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your offer, Ryanah. While I appreciate your interest, I'm afraid that 100 Euros per month may not be within my budget. I would need to see a higher rental price to make it worth my while. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
80 Euros per month

I am willing to accept this offer if it is final.

TERMINATE
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your offer, Ryanah. While it is tempting, I am not able to accept this price at this time. I am looking for a higher rental price that will allow me to maximize my gains. I appreciate your understanding and I hope we can continue to negotiate to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
